II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 1164
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2013 cQ,s ui 26 jeks Èk
m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2013 cQ,s ui 12 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg
NdrÈh hq;= h'
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&

fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
1163 - B 80743— 2,200 (2013/07)

fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka  nd.; l< yel'
ie' hq' - (i)  .,ayskak cdñw;=,a *;a;dya wrdì úÿy, ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2013 uehs ui 10 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l
iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(ii)  .nvd jHdmD;s ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2013 uehs ui 10 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ
m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(iii)  fifrÜfi Ldud mokï Ndrh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2013 uehs ui 10 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'07'051164
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
lïlre úksYaph iNdj - wxl 06
kjk.rh - r;akmqr
01' fuu úksYaph iNdfõ mjrk ,ÿj 2000 j¾Ih jk úg ksfhda. § wjika lrk ,o my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq f.dkq 2013'10'31
Èfkka miqj fuu úksYaph iNd N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' fuu kvq iïnkaOj hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvq f.dkqjl msgm;la fyda hï fldgil msgm;la ,nd.ekSug wjYH
kï" ta i|yd b,a¨ïm;% 2013'10'15 jeks Èkg fmr fuu úksYaph iNdfõ iyldr f,alï fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2013'10'31 Èfkka miqj fuu úksYaph iNd N+ñfha § mq¿iaid
úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
ví' ta' ã' bfkdald je,slvwdrÉÑ"

úúO oekaùï

wfkdaud .uf.a jk uu" Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda. 48 ^1& hgf;a —ohdirK ixj¾Ok
moku˜ ixia:d.; lsÍu'
—ohdirK ixj¾Ok moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ § bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia
lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;ys wruqK jkafka my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS —ohdirK ixj¾Ok moku˜ ixia:d.;
lsÍuhs (-
1' wd.ñl" ixialD;sl" wOHdmksl yd wd¾Óluh wka;¾ iïnkaO;d u.ska m%foaYfha ;reK ;reKshka w;r wd.ñl tluq;=lu"
wfkHdkH wjfndaOh" wOHd;añl j¾Okh" fyd| ys; yd ñ;%;ajh ÈhqKq lsÍu ;
2' m%foaYfha ck;djf.a whs;Ska" iqN idOkh" wNsreÑh" wdrlaIdj" wjxllu ^mQ¾K;ajh& wdrlaId lr .ekSu i|yd Wmldr
lsÍu ;

3' ld¾hd, fõ,djka  fmrjre 8'30 isg miajre 4'15 olajd fõ'

5' ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYk i|yd  .dia;=j l,ska  f.úh  hq;=hs' ±kaùï  iy m%ldYkhka ;emEf,ka tjk úg ta iu. u  whúh
hq;= .dia;=j i|yd uqo,a wekjqula fyda fpla m;la  fyda ;eme,a wekjqula rcfha  uqøKd,hdêm;sg túh hq;= h' uqo,a weKjqï
f.jk ld¾hd,h fnd/,a, ;eme,a ld¾hd,h fõ'
6' m%udoh  iy fodia j<lajd .ekSu i|yd  m< lrkakg kshñ; msgm; lvodisfha  tla me;a;l muKla meyeÈ,s j  ghsma  lr túh
hq;= h'  w;a wl=ßka  ,shQ lsisu  ksfõokhla  Ndr.kq fkd,efí'

fkd,efí'

^wÕf,a iEu fldgilg u iïmQ¾K wÕ,lg wh lrkq ,nk .dia;=j wh lrkq ,efí'&
11' iEu isl=rdod  Èklg u Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl  iudcjd§  ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  m%isoaO ksjdvq Èk w;rg
meñfKk iEu i;shl § u  m< lrk  Èkh fjkia ùug bv ;sfí'
12' iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha  .eiÜ m;%fha  iEu fldgil u fl,jfrys fjku m<jk  ±kaùfï i|yka  m%ldr" ish¨ u  ±kaùï

13' .eiÜ m;%h fkd,eîu" m%udo ù ,eîu iy ,smskh fjkia lsÍï wdÈh fld<U 08" rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ" uqøKd,hdêm;sg
oekqï Èh hq;= h'
14' 2013 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk isg ls%hd;auljk ixfYdaê; odhl .dia;=j (-
 Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h - ^jd¾Isl odhl uqo, iy ;eme,a .dia;=j&
jd¾Isl odhl uqo, ;eme,a .dia;=j
re' Y'  re' Y'
I jeks fldgi (
I jeks fþoh …          …          …          …           …           …       … 4"160 00 9"340 00
II jeks fþoh ^m< lsÍï"  wenE¾;=" fgkav¾ iy úNd. wdÈh& …       … 580 00 950 00
III jeks fþoh ^fj<| ,l=Kq iy fmagkaÜ n,m;% wdÈh &       …       … 405 00 750 00
I jeks fldgi iïmQ¾Kfhka  ^I" II iy III fþo ;=k u we;=<;a j &       …      … 890 00 2"500 00
II jeks fldgi ^wêlrK&        …       …     …       …   …       …       …      … 860 00 450 00

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'07'05 1189
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
